languages.text: "Угу. Уповай на мой добрый и мягкий нрав, известный всей Прорве".
"Will you, now? Going to pin your hopes on my good and gentle nature, famed throughout the Chasm?"
languages.original_text: "Угу. Уповай на мой добрый и мягкий нрав, известный всей Прорве".

traits.locale_text: "Will you, now? Going to pin your hopes on my good and gentle nature, famed throughout the Chasm?"
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "Will you, now? Going to pin your hopes on my good and gentle nature, famed throughout the Chasm?"
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "Will you, now? Going to pin your hopes on my good and gentle nature, famed throughout the Chasm?"
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "Will you, now? Going to pin your hopes on my good and gentle nature, famed throughout the Chasm?"
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “是吗，真的吗？你打算把希望寄托在我温柔善良的天性上吗？噢，整个裂隙都知道我最善良了。”
languages.original_text: "Will you, now? Going to pin your hopes on my good and gentle nature, famed throughout the Chasm?"

traits.locale_text: “是吗，真的吗？你打算把希望寄托在我温柔善良的天性上吗？噢，整个裂隙都知道我最善良了。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «¿Ah, sí? ¿Vas a depositar tus esperanzas en mi talante amable, famoso en todo el Abismo?».
languages.original_text: "Will you, now? Going to pin your hopes on my good and gentle nature, famed throughout the Chasm?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Ah, sí? ¿Vas a depositar tus esperanzas en mi talante amable, famoso en todo el Abismo?».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「ほう？裂け目中で名高き、この私の善意と優しさに賭けるつもりか？」
languages.original_text: "Will you, now? Going to pin your hopes on my good and gentle nature, famed throughout the Chasm?"

traits.locale_text: 「ほう？裂け目中で名高き、この私の善意と優しさに賭けるつもりか？」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Ach, tatsächlich? Wollt Ihr Eure Hoffnungen in mein gutmütiges, sanftes Wesen setzen, für das in der gesamten Kluft berühmt bin?"
languages.original_text: "Will you, now? Going to pin your hopes on my good and gentle nature, famed throughout the Chasm?"

traits.locale_text: "Ach, tatsächlich? Wollt Ihr Eure Hoffnungen in mein gutmütiges, sanftes Wesen setzen, für das in der gesamten Kluft berühmt bin?"
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « Vraiment ? Vous allez placer tous vos espoirs sur ma nature bienveillante, vantée dans tout l'Abîme ? »
languages.original_text: "Will you, now? Going to pin your hopes on my good and gentle nature, famed throughout the Chasm?"

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? Vous allez placer tous vos espoirs sur ma nature bienveillante, vantée dans toute la Faille ? »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Öyle mi? Umutlarını, iyi huylu ve nazik mizacıma mı bağlıyorsun? Tabii ya, Yarık'ın dört yanında böyle huylarımla bilinirim."
languages.original_text: "Will you, now? Going to pin your hopes on my good and gentle nature, famed throughout the Chasm?"

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi? İyi huylu ve nazik mizacıma mı bağlıyorsun umutlarını? Tabii ya, Yarık'ın dört yanında böyle tanırlar beni."
traits.speaker: Anger
